description:
Dr. Riddles` new strategy seems to baffle Belgim, and the team uses this to their advantage. But a surprising miscalculation ends up injuring Dr. Riddles. With the Doctor injured, Kedo utilizes all the wisdom that the Doctor has taught him and comes up wi
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arigatou Boku no Ou-sama: Mikoruo Ma Zegaruga
Dr. Riddles, You`ll Always Be My King
ありがとう僕の王様 ミコルオ・マ・ゼガルガ
